2 #permalink Typography

Font definitions and typography system using Clash Display for headings and Satoshi for body copy. Variable fonts are used for optimal performance.

Source: src/assets/scss/base/_typography.scss, line 1

2.1 #permalink Font Sizes

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

A harmonious type scale for consistent typography throughout the design.

Example
Extra Small Text (12px)
Small Text (14px)
Base Text (16px)
Large Text (18px)
Extra Large Text (20px)
2XL Heading (24px)
3XL Heading (30px)
4XL Heading (36px)
5XL Heading (48px)
6XL Heading (64px)
Markup 
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-body); font-size: var(--font-size-xs);">Extra Small Text (12px)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-body); font-size: var(--font-size-sm);">Small Text (14px)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-body); font-size: var(--font-size-base);">Base Text (16px)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-body); font-size: var(--font-size-lg);">Large Text (18px)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-body); font-size: var(--font-size-xl);">Extra Large Text (20px)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-heading); font-size: var(--font-size-2xl);">2XL Heading (24px)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-heading); font-size: var(--font-size-3xl);">3XL Heading (30px)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-heading); font-size: var(--font-size-4xl);">4XL Heading (36px)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-heading); font-size: var(--font-size-5xl);">5XL Heading (48px)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-heading); font-size: var(--font-size-6xl);">6XL Heading (64px)</div>
Source: src/assets/scss/base/_typography.scss, line 61

2.2 #permalink Font Weights

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Font weight variations. Clash Display (headings) supports 200-700, Satoshi (body) supports 300-900.

Example
Clash Display (Headings):
Extralight (200)
Light (300)
Regular (400)
Medium (500)
Semibold (600)
Bold (700)
Satoshi (Body):
Light (300)
Regular (400)
Medium (500)
Bold (700)
Black (900)
Markup 
<div style="margin-bottom: 10px;"><strong>Clash Display (Headings):</strong></div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-heading); font-weight: 200; font-size: 24px; margin-bottom: 5px;">Extralight (200)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-heading); font-weight: 300; font-size: 24px; margin-bottom: 5px;">Light (300)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-heading); font-weight: 400; font-size: 24px; margin-bottom: 5px;">Regular (400)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-heading); font-weight: 500; font-size: 24px; margin-bottom: 5px;">Medium (500)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-heading); font-weight: 600; font-size: 24px; margin-bottom: 5px;">Semibold (600)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-heading); font-weight: 700; font-size: 24px; margin-bottom: 20px;">Bold (700)</div>
<div style="margin-bottom: 10px;"><strong>Satoshi (Body):</strong></div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-body); font-weight: 300; font-size: 18px; margin-bottom: 5px;">Light (300)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-body); font-weight: 400; font-size: 18px; margin-bottom: 5px;">Regular (400)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-body); font-weight: 500; font-size: 18px; margin-bottom: 5px;">Medium (500)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-body); font-weight: 700; font-size: 18px; margin-bottom: 5px;">Bold (700)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-body); font-weight: 900; font-size: 18px;">Black (900)</div>
Source: src/assets/scss/base/_typography.scss, line 95

2.4 #permalink Headings

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Heading styles using Clash Display.

Example

Heading 1 - Clash Display

Heading 2 - Clash Display

Heading 3 - Clash Display

Heading 4 - Clash Display

Heading 5 - Clash Display
Heading 6 - Clash Display
Markup 
<h1>Heading 1 - Clash Display</h1>
<h2>Heading 2 - Clash Display</h2>
<h3>Heading 3 - Clash Display</h3>
<h4>Heading 4 - Clash Display</h4>
<h5>Heading 5 - Clash Display</h5>
<h6>Heading 6 - Clash Display</h6>
Source: src/assets/scss/base/_typography.scss, line 145

2.5 #permalink Body Text

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Body text uses Satoshi for optimal readability.

Example

This is a paragraph of body text using Satoshi. It's designed for excellent readability at smaller sizes. Variable fonts allow for precise weight adjustments.

Bold text and italic text are both supported with the variable font.

Light weight text (300)

Medium weight text (500)

Markup 
<p>This is a paragraph of body text using Satoshi. It's designed for excellent readability at smaller sizes. Variable fonts allow for precise weight adjustments.</p>
<p><strong>Bold text</strong> and <em>italic text</em> are both supported with the variable font.</p>
<p style="font-weight: 300;">Light weight text (300)</p>
<p style="font-weight: 500;">Medium weight text (500)</p>
Source: src/assets/scss/base/_typography.scss, line 200
